A Note from Our Managing Director
Michael Skairjeh Managing Director
promising future.
It gives me pleasure to introduce our company BlueRidge ITFZE to your esteemed organization.
As I reflect on our achievements since our launch in 2011, I am tremendously proud of what we have accomplished, and even more enthusiastic about our
We have successfully transitioned from a local Dubai start-up to becoming a well-recognized Cloud Computing firm, harvesting business from across the region, and along the way earning our clients' trust and respect.
I'm particularly proud to know that we are able to assist our customers in building a sustainable IT transformation Strategy that enables them to run their business more efficiently and economically. One of our key principles is to exceed our customers' expectations, helping them to confront and overcome their challenges, and to provide the best solutions in each instance. My desire is for our experts to provide our customers with superior levels of care and support constantly and consistently.
In this continually evolving marketplace, our customers are more informed than ever about their solution provider options. Even so, they continue to select BlueRidge IT as their partner of choice because of our experience, commitment to quality, integrity, transparency, and work ethic.
I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for this tremendous opportunity and for your incredible support. BlueRidge IT's success is a result of our hard work, as well as your valuable ongoing patronage.
I look forward to working with you in 2023, and beyond.
Sincerely, Michael Skajeh
Microsoft Partner Microsoft

About BlueRidge IT
BlueRidge IT FZE was established and "Born in the Cloud" in 2011.
BlueRidge IT provides the best-in-class technologies, consultation, training and support to help enterprises and small businesses achieve their Digital Transformation and Workplace Modernization objectives securely, efficiently and innovatively.
We are specialized on Microsoft Cloud Solutions and are a Microsoft FastTrack Partner providing expertise in Microsoft 365, Windows 365, PowerApps, Power Platform, PowerBI, Microsoft Azure, Enterprise Mobility Suite, SharePoint, MS Dynamics 365 and Microsoft EPM.
We hold Gold Competency indicating Microsoft's recognition of our expertise with their technologies and our proven record in surpassing customers' expectations.

Project Introduction
BlueRidge IT FZE is pleased to respond to Abu Dhabi Airports - ADAC 's request for modernization of their intranet portal. We understand that Abu Dhabi Airports - ADAC is interested in a modern, accessible, and seamless platform that provides their employees with a centralized location for all company services and resources.
As a Microsoft Gold and Tier-1 Cloud Solutions Provider, BlueRidge IT has helped companies successfully make the move to the cloud. Companies of all sizes, from global conglomerates to small and mid-sized companies, have embraced cloud-based Solutions to achieve compliance, while reducing major costs related to administration and IT support. This singular approach provides tremendous cost savings that are inherent in the cloud computing model.
Through our strategic partnership and alliances, we bring a vast wealth of experiences to our clients to help them achieve their corporate goals and alignment with their business objectives. Furthermore, through our influence and power of negotiations, we cover substantial cost savings for our clients to help them achieve their goals economically and efficiently.
At BlueRidge IT, we believe that evolving to the next generation of IT efficiency will require a new level of integration and collaboration between Business and IT. This involves transforming IT to speak, think and run IT as a business.
BlueRidge IT Consults, Deploys and Supports Your Cloud and Mission Critical Projects End-to-End.

Executive Summary
Abu Dhabi Airports - ADAC is looking to create a modern and cloud hosted intranet, providing their employees with seamless access to the various systems, pages and links utilized within Abu Dhabi Airports - ADAC , making it act as a one stop shop.
Current State and requirement: Abu Dhabi Airports - ADAC currently utilize some of the Microsoft 365 services, with a plan to utilize the Viva Suite and Insider Risk Manager.
Challenges: Although Abu Dhabi Airports - ADAC have already started their journey to the cloud, they face another task now in modernizing their security stack to accommodate this change. In addition to adapting their users to the new ways of working, and the new solutions that are part of the Microsoft 365 suite.
The Solution: It is our privilege to offer Abu Dhabi Airports - ADAC our Blueridge Professional Services to assist in the implementation, migration, and rollout of the Microsoft 365 cloud services.
Below are the Microsoft 365 workloads included in FastTrack:

Productivity, Mobility & Security Life Cycle
M365 brings together devices, apps, and data, creating a modern IT landscape that enables users to innovate and be truly productive. The M365 bundle includes the following solutions that would help you secure your environment:
Viva Insights: Bring together communications, knowledge, learning, resources, and insights into an employee experience that integrates seamlessly into the apps you use every day, that help people and businesses thrive with data-driven, privacy-protected insights and recommendations to improve productivity and wellbeing.
Viva Learning: Empowers employees to make learning a natural part of the day by bringing learning into the flow of work within the tools and platforms they already use. Discover, share, and track learning across a variety of sources from a center of learning in Microsoft Teams.
Viva Connections: Is your gateway to a modern employee experience designed to keep everyone engaged and informed. Viva Connections is a customizable app in Microsoft Teams that gives everyone a personalized destination to discover relevant news, conversations, and the tools they need to succeed.
Viva Topics: Uses Microsoft Al technology, Microsoft 365, Microsoft Graph, Search, and other components and services to bring knowledge to your users in the Microsoft 365 apps they use every day, starting with SharePoint modern pages, Microsoft Search, and Search in Word, PowerPoint, Outlook, and Excel.
Insider Risk Manager (IRM): A compliance solution that helps minimize internal risks by enabling you to detect, investigate, and act on malicious and inadvertent activities in your organization.

Viva Insights
The customer agreed to deploy Viva Insights as proof by the email approval and scheduled for two weeks as per the project start in table 1.2 page 21
The Microsoft Viva Insights app in Microsoft Teams and on the web shows you personalized recommendations that help you do your best work. Get insights for building better work habits, such as following through on commitments made to collaborators and protecting focus time in the day for uninterrupted, individual work.
It derives these insights by summarizing your Microsoft 365 data - data that you already have access to - about emails, meetings, calls, and chats.
By using the Viva Insights app, you can:
· Stay connected - Stay on top of your collaboration with colleagues through features such as Al-based task suggestions and meeting assistance.
· Protect time - Find more time to eliminate distractions, stop multi-tasking, and focus on your core priorities.
· Send praise - Send acclaim to your employees and coworkers, either in a private chat or in a Teams channel conversation.
· Reflect - Take a moment to check in with yourself, to reflect on how you're feeling.
· Headspace - Experience a guided meditation from Headspace.
· Take a break - During your workday, take an occasional one-minute "breathing break."
· Start a virtual commute - Mindfully close out your workday.
· Use Microsoft To-Do - Take action on a task in your to-do list.

Viva Learning
The customer agreed to deploy Viva Learning as proof by the email approval and scheduled for two weeks as per the project start in table 1.2 page 21
Viva Learning is a centralized learning hub in Microsoft Teams that lets you seamlessly integrate learning and building skills into your day. In Viva Learning, your team can discover, share, recommend, and learn from content libraries provided by both your organization and partners. They can do all of this without leaving Microsoft Teams.
Viva Learning makes it easy to incorporate learning into your day. When you open Viva Learning in Microsoft Teams, you'll see a personalized view of learning content from both your organization and partners such as LinkedIn Learning. As you continue to search for and complete more training, your recommended content will be updated to reflect your interests.
· Easily find learning opportunities provided by your organization.
. Browse courses from Microsoft and third-party content providers.
· Search for specific learning content that appeals to you or supports your career goals.
· Share relevant, interesting, and important learning content with your team members or groups in a Microsoft Teams chat or channel.
· Organize your custom selections of learning content in Microsoft Teams channels and tabs.
· Bookmark courses you're interested in.
· Play LinkedIn Learning courses in the embedded player without leaving Microsoft Teams.

Viva Connections
The customer agreed to deploy Viva Connections as proof by the email approval and scheduled for two weeks as per the project start in table 1.2 page 21
Viva Connections is the gateway to a modern employee experience. It helps the entire organization stay engaged and informed with seamless information sharing by providing employees with a curated experience that includes relevant news, conversations, and other resources-all in one place.
In addition, Viva Connections provides a single, curated, employee destination to reinforce an organization's identity with custom branding. It's personalized and appears in the apps employees already use every day, like Microsoft Teams. By connecting everyone, from frontline workers to information workers, it unites them around the organization's vision, mission, and strategic priorities. Organizations can deploy Viva Connections with minimal effort by building on existing capabilities in Microsoft 365, like SharePoint and Yammer.
Viva Connections integrates content from Microsoft 365 services like SharePoint, Teams, Yammer, Microsoft Stream, and more-into a consolidated, and customizable 'single pane' for every employee. It gives everyone the tools they need to be successful via three interactive experiences for employees:
· A personalized feed to enable employees to explore news and contribute to the conversation from anywhere.
· A personalized dashboard serves as the company home for employees and is designed to be the central destination for everyone to discover resources and complete tasks.
· A personalized resources area that allows them to get to the sites, communities, video playlists, and other content that matter most to them.

Viva Topics
The customer agreed to deploy Viva Topics as proof by the email approval and scheduled for two weeks as per the project start in table 1.2 page 21
Viva Topics uses Microsoft Al technology, Microsoft 365, Microsoft Graph, Search, and other components and services to bring knowledge to your users in the Microsoft 365 apps they use every day, starting with SharePoint modern pages, Microsoft Search, and Search in Word, PowerPoint, Outlook, and Excel.
Viva Topics helps to address a key business issue in many companies - providing the information to users when they need it. For example, new employees need to learn a lot of new information quickly, and encounter terms they know nothing about when reading through company information. To learn more, the user might need to step away from what they are doing and spend valuable time searching for details, such as information about what the term is, who in the organization is a subject matter expert, and maybe sites and documents that are related to the term.
Viva Topics uses Al to automatically search for and identify topics in your organization. It compiles information about them, such as a short description, people working on the topic, and sites, files, and pages that are related to it. A knowledge manager or contributor can choose to update the topic information as needed. The topics are available to your users, which means that for every instance of the topic that appears in a modern SharePoint site in news and pages, the text will be highlighted. Users can choose to select the topic to learn more about it through the topic details. Topics can also be found in SharePoint Search.

Insider Risk Manager
The customer agreed to deploy Insider Risk Manager as proof by the email approval and scheduled for two weeks as per the project start in table 1.2 page 21
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management is a compliance solution that helps minimize internal risks by enabling you to detect, investigate, and act on malicious and inadvertent activities in your organization. Insider risk policies allow you to define the types of risks to identify and detect in your organization, including acting on cases and escalating cases to Microsoft eDiscovery (Premium) if needed. Risk analysts in your organization can quickly take appropriate actions to make sure users are compliant with your organization's compliance standards.
· Insider risk management is centered around the following principles:
· Transparency: Balance user privacy versus organization risk with privacy-by-design architecture.
· Configurable: Configurable policies based on industry, geographical, and business groups.
· Integrated: Integrated workflow across Microsoft Purview solutions.
· Actionable: Provides insights to enable reviewer notifications, data investigations, and user investigations.

In Scope

- Deploy and configure Viva Learning
- Setup Viva Topics
- Enable and configure Viva Insights
- Implement Viva Connections
- Configure Insider Risk Manager
Out of Scope
Following items are excluded from the scope of BlueRidge IT deliverables in this engagement.
- Design and optimization of AD, GPO, and network services
- Integration with on-premises telephony services or gateways is out of scope
- Testing, upgrading or fixing issues with incompatible/unsupported applications.
- Training employees on internal LOB applications.
- Testing internal applications.
- Troubleshooting compatibility issues with third party services.

- Migration of Desktop Applications.

Project Assumptions
This project assumes certain participation requirements described below and as otherwise identified by the parties during the course of this engagement.
The CUSTOMER will provide Blueridge IT with:
- The customer will provide the IT consultant with the required access for the Remote Deployment.
- Access to IT staff, documentation, and facilities as necessary for BlueRidge IT to perform its Services.
- The CUSTOMER will kindly make reasonable efforts in advance to assemble and share relevant documentation and records in accordance with the scope. The request for such information will be placed in advance by BlueRidge IT project team.
- The customer will not approach vendor's staff for job opportunities.
- The CUSTOMER will kindly provide BlueRidge IT consultants with Admin Credentials to the Office 365 portal.
- The CUSTOMER will kindly ensure availability of the infrastructure Admins to undertake Change Requests relevant to project once approved.
- The CUSTOMER will select the target users for deployment and manage communications/notifications to ensure the availability of selected users for rollout.
- The CUSTOMER to provide internal resources during the mass rollout phase
- The customer to avail Migration Tools if required.
- The customer to provide the vendor with a Testimonial and/or White Paper participation after project completion and to the satisfaction of the customer.
BlueRidge IT will provide The CUSTOMER with:
- All items mentioned in the deliverable section.
- All Microsoft 365 features, applications and tools covered in this project are subject to available licenses E3/E5.
- Complete adherence to The CUSTOMER Non-Disclosure, Safety policies, and corporate procedures.
- A dedicated BlueRidge IT Consultant(s), and Account Manager working on and off premises as deem within the scope of the project timeline. BlueRidge IT working hours from 9:00am to 6:00pm and after hours as deem appropriate to meet the project timelines.
User Orientation - Abu Dhabi Airports - ADAC and BlueRidge IT will jointly develop and facilitate user orientation sessions to demonstrate the capabilities of new operating platform.
- Any changes to the agreed project scope including additional request/requirements made. BlueRidge IT will advise The CUSTOMER and, where possible, any cost variation will be quoted in advance for The CUSTOMER approval before BlueRidge IT proceeds further.

A Note from Our Managing Director
It gives me pleasure to introduce our
As I reflect on our achievements since
our launch in 2011, I am tremendously
proud of what we have accomplished,
and even more enthusiastic about our
We have successfully transitioned from a local Dubai start-up to becoming a well-recognized Cloud
Computing firm, harvesting business from across the region, and along the way earning our clients'
I'm particularly proud to know that we are able to assist our customers in building a sustainable IT
transformation Strategy that enables them to run their business more efficiently and economically.
One of our key principles is to exceed our customers' expectations, helping them to confront and
overcome their challenges, and to provide the best solutions in each instance. My desire is for our
experts to provide our customers with superior levels of care and support constantly and
In this continually evolving marketplace, our customers are more informed than ever about their
solution provider options. Even so, they continue to select BlueRidge IT as their partner of choice
because of our experience, commitment to quality, integrity, transparency, and work ethic.
I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for this tremendous opportunity and for your
incredible support. BlueRidge IT's success is a result of our hard work, as well as your valuable
I look forward to working with you in 2023, and beyond.

BlueRidge IT FZE was established and "Born in the Cloud" in 2011.
BlueRidge IT provides the best-in-class technologies, consultation, training and support to help
enterprises and small businesses achieve their Digital Transformation and Workplace Modernization
We are specialized on Microsoft Cloud Solutions and are a Microsoft FastTrack Partner
providing expertise in Microsoft 365, Windows 365, PowerApps, Power Platform, PowerBI,
Microsoft Azure, Enterprise Mobility Suite, SharePoint, MS Dynamics 365 and Microsoft
We hold Gold Competency indicating Microsoft's recognition of our expertise with their
technologies and our proven record in surpassing customers' expectations.

Our experts have a passion for technology and specialize in providing consultancy and cloud
solutions to organizations of all sizes, including but not limited to Retail, Manufacturing,
Healthcare, Oil and Gas, Government, Education and Professional Services.
In addition to our Microsoft competencies, we have established partnerships with technology
vendors across an array of digital transformation, security and business productivity solutions.

BlueRidge IT FZE is pleased to respond to Abu Dhabi Airports - ADAC 's request for
modernization of their intranet portal. We understand that Abu Dhabi Airports - ADAC is
interested in a modern, accessible, and seamless platform that provides their employees with a
centralized location for all company services and resources.
As a Microsoft Gold and Tier-1 Cloud Solutions Provider, BlueRidge IT has helped companies
successfully make the move to the cloud. Companies of all sizes, from global conglomerates to
small and mid-sized companies, have embraced cloud-based Solutions to achieve compliance,
while reducing major costs related to administration and IT support. This singular approach provides
tremendous cost savings that are inherent in the cloud computing model.
Through our strategic partnership and alliances, we bring a vast wealth of experiences to our clients
to help them achieve their corporate goals and alignment with their business objectives.
Furthermore, through our influence and power of negotiations, we cover substantial cost savings
for our clients to help them achieve their goals economically and efficiently.
At BlueRidge IT, we believe that evolving to the next generation of IT efficiency will require a new
level of integration and collaboration between Business and IT. This involves transforming IT to
speak, think and run IT as a business.
BlueRidge IT Consults, Deploys and Supports Your Cloud

Abu Dhabi Airports - ADAC is looking to create a modern and cloud hosted intranet, providing their
employees with seamless access to the various systems, pages and links utilized within Abu Dhabi
Airports - ADAC , making it act as a one stop shop.
Current State and requirement: Abu Dhabi Airports - ADAC currently utilize some of the
Microsoft 365 services, with a plan to utilize the Viva Suite and Insider Risk Manager.
Challenges: Although Abu Dhabi Airports - ADAC have already started their journey to the cloud,
they face another task now in modernizing their security stack to accommodate this change. In
addition to adapting their users to the new ways of working, and the new solutions that are part of
The Solution: It is our privilege to offer Abu Dhabi Airports - ADAC our Blueridge Professional
Services to assist in the implementation, migration, and rollout of the Microsoft 365 cloud services.

M365 brings together devices, apps, and data, creating a modern IT landscape that enables users
to innovate and be truly productive. The M365 bundle includes the following solutions that would
Viva Insights: Bring together communications, knowledge, learning, resources, and insights into an
employee experience that integrates seamlessly into the apps you use every day, that help people
and businesses thrive with data-driven, privacy-protected insights and recommendations to
Viva Learning: Empowers employees to make learning a natural part of the day by bringing learning
into the flow of work within the tools and platforms they already use. Discover, share, and track
learning across a variety of sources from a center of learning in Microsoft Teams.
Viva Connections: Is your gateway to a modern employee experience designed to keep everyone
engaged and informed. Viva Connections is a customizable app in Microsoft Teams that gives
everyone a personalized destination to discover relevant news, conversations, and the tools they
Viva Topics: Uses Microsoft Al technology, Microsoft 365, Microsoft Graph, Search, and other
components and services to bring knowledge to your users in the Microsoft 365 apps they use every
day, starting with SharePoint modern pages, Microsoft Search, and Search in Word, PowerPoint,
Insider Risk Manager (IRM): A compliance solution that helps minimize internal risks by enabling you
to detect, investigate, and act on malicious and inadvertent activities in your organization.

The Microsoft Viva Insights app in Microsoft Teams and on the web shows you personalized
recommendations that help you do your best work. Get insights for building better work habits,
such as following through on commitments made to collaborators and protecting focus time in the
It derives these insights by summarizing your Microsoft 365 data - data that you already have access
to - about emails, meetings, calls, and chats.
By using the Viva Insights app, you can:
· Stay connected - Stay on top of your collaboration with colleagues through features such
as Al-based task suggestions and meeting assistance.
· Protect time - Find more time to eliminate distractions, stop multi-tasking, and focus on
· Send praise - Send acclaim to your employees and coworkers, either in a private chat or in
· Reflect - Take a moment to check in with yourself, to reflect on how you're feeling.
· Headspace - Experience a guided meditation from Headspace.
· Take a break - During your workday, take an occasional one-minute "breathing break."
· Start a virtual commute - Mindfully close out your workday.
· Use Microsoft To-Do - Take action on a task in your to-do list.

With us, IT'S all about CLOUD
The customer agreed to deploy Viva Learning as proof by the email approval and scheduled for
two weeks as per the project start in table 1.2 page 21
Viva Learning is a centralized learning hub in Microsoft Teams that lets you seamlessly integrate
learning and building skills into your day. In Viva Learning, your team can discover, share,
recommend, and learn from content libraries provided by both your organization and partners.
They can do all of this without leaving Microsoft Teams.
Viva Learning makes it easy to incorporate learning into your day. When you open Viva Learning in
Microsoft Teams, you'll see a personalized view of learning content from both your organization
and partners such as LinkedIn Learning. As you continue to search for and complete more training,
your recommended content will be updated to reflect your interests.
· Easily find learning opportunities provided by your organization.
. Browse courses from Microsoft and third-party content providers.
· Search for specific learning content that appeals to you or supports your career goals.
· Share relevant, interesting, and important learning content with your team members or
groups in a Microsoft Teams chat or channel.
· Organize your custom selections of learning content in Microsoft Teams channels and tabs.
· Play LinkedIn Learning courses in the embedded player without leaving Microsoft Teams.

IT Transformation. IT Service Management. Application Management, Readiness & Deployment. Cloud Computing
With us, IT'S all about CLOUD
The customer agreed to deploy Viva Connections as proof by the email approval and scheduled
for two weeks as per the project start in table 1.2 page 21
Viva Connections is the gateway to a modern employee experience. It helps the entire organization
stay engaged and informed with seamless information sharing by providing employees with a
curated experience that includes relevant news, conversations, and other resources-all in one
In addition, Viva Connections provides a single, curated, employee destination to reinforce an
organization's identity with custom branding. It's personalized and appears in the apps employees
already use every day, like Microsoft Teams. By connecting everyone, from frontline workers to
information workers, it unites them around the organization's vision, mission, and strategic priorities.
Organizations can deploy Viva Connections with minimal effort by building on existing capabilities
in Microsoft 365, like SharePoint and Yammer.
Viva Connections integrates content from Microsoft 365 services like SharePoint, Teams, Yammer,
Microsoft Stream, and more-into a consolidated, and customizable 'single pane' for every
employee. It gives everyone the tools they need to be successful via three interactive experiences
· A personalized feed to enable employees to explore news and contribute to the
· A personalized dashboard serves as the company home for employees and is designed to
be the central destination for everyone to discover resources and complete tasks.
· A personalized resources area that allows them to get to the sites, communities, video
playlists, and other content that matter most to them.
IT Transformation. IT Service Management. Application Management, Readiness & Deployment. Cloud Computing
With us, IT'S all about CLOUD
The customer agreed to deploy Viva Topics as proof by the email approval and scheduled for two
weeks as per the project start in table 1.2 page 21
Viva Topics uses Microsoft Al technology, Microsoft 365, Microsoft Graph, Search, and other
components and services to bring knowledge to your users in the Microsoft 365 apps they use
every day, starting with SharePoint modern pages, Microsoft Search, and Search in Word,
Viva Topics helps to address a key business issue in many companies - providing the information
to users when they need it. For example, new employees need to learn a lot of new information
quickly, and encounter terms they know nothing about when reading through company
information. To learn more, the user might need to step away from what they are doing and spend
valuable time searching for details, such as information about what the term is, who in the
organization is a subject matter expert, and maybe sites and documents that are related to the
Viva Topics uses Al to automatically search for and identify topics in your organization. It compiles
information about them, such as a short description, people working on the topic, and sites, files,
and pages that are related to it. A knowledge manager or contributor can choose to update the
topic information as needed. The topics are available to your users, which means that for every
instance of the topic that appears in a modern SharePoint site in news and pages, the text will be
highlighted. Users can choose to select the topic to learn more about it through the topic details.
Topics can also be found in SharePoint Search.
To successfully modify these settings, you will need to have group admin permissions.
Contact your global admin to be assigned group admin permissions.
Who can create and edit topics
Only selected people or security groups
Only selected people or security groups
ge managers can create, confirm, or remove topics in the topic center.
Who can see Viva Topics Early Adopter Program experiences
Only selected people or security groups

The customer agreed to deploy Insider Risk Manager as proof by the email approval and scheduled
for two weeks as per the project start in table 1.2 page 21
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management is a compliance solution that helps minimize internal
risks by enabling you to detect, investigate, and act on malicious and inadvertent activities in your
organization. Insider risk policies allow you to define the types of risks to identify and detect in your
organization, including acting on cases and escalating cases to Microsoft eDiscovery (Premium) if
needed. Risk analysts in your organization can quickly take appropriate actions to make sure users
are compliant with your organization's compliance standards.
· Insider risk management is centered around the following principles:
· Transparency: Balance user privacy versus organization risk with privacy-by-design
· Configurable: Configurable policies based on industry, geographical, and business groups.
· Integrated: Integrated workflow across Microsoft Purview solutions.
· Actionable: Provides insights to enable reviewer notifications, data investigations, and user

Project Deliverables.value: Project Deliverables BlueRidge IT FZE is engaged to assist Abu Dhabi Airports - ADAC with the Design, Implementation and Rollout of the following Microsoft 365 cloud services: 1. Viva Learning 2. Viva Topics 3. Viva Insights 4. Viva Connections 5. Insider Risk Manager
Project Deliverables.content:
Project Deliverables
BlueRidge IT FZE is engaged to assist Abu Dhabi Airports - ADAC with the Design, Implementation and Rollout of the following Microsoft 365 cloud services:
1. Viva Learning
2. Viva Topics
3. Viva Insights
4. Viva Connections
5. Insider Risk Manager

In Scope.value: In Scope Following are the major deliverables in scope of this engagement: - Deploy and configure Viva Learning - Setup Viva Topics - Enable and configure Viva Insights - Implement Viva Connections - Configure Insider Risk Manager
In Scope.content:
In Scope
Following are the major deliverables in scope of this engagement:
- Deploy and configure Viva Learning
- Setup Viva Topics
- Enable and configure Viva Insights
- Implement Viva Connections
- Configure Insider Risk Manager

Out Scope.value: Out of Scope Following items are excluded from the scope of BlueRidge IT deliverables in this engagement. - Design and optimization of AD, GPO, and network services - Integration with on-premises telephony services or gateways is out of scope - Testing, upgrading or fixing issues with incompatible/unsupported applications. - Training employees on internal LOB applications. - Testing internal applications. - Troubleshooting compatibility issues with third party services. - User Data backup restore or migration of any user/application data. - Fixing of Hardware/firmware issues - Migration of Desktop Applications. - Install or configure any 3rd party software. - Migration of Email Archive or PST - Install or configure OS, Apps, or any other IT related support on Personal computers. - Purchase or provisioning of any third-party migration tools - Purchase of SBC, or phone system devices/licenses needs to be done by the customer. - Modifying code of existing websites or webapps. - Troubleshooting website/database issues
Out Scope.content:
Out of Scope
Following items are excluded from the scope of BlueRidge IT deliverables in this engagement.
- Design and optimization of AD, GPO, and network services
- Integration with on-premises telephony services or gateways is out of scope
- Testing, upgrading or fixing issues with incompatible/unsupported applications.

- Purchase of SBC, or phone system devices/licenses needs to be done by the customer.
- Modifying code of existing websites or webapps.
- Troubleshooting website/database issues
